metadata.title: CVE-2024-21742 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper input validation allows for header injection in MIME4J librarywhen using MIME4J DOM for composing message. This can be exploited by anattacker to add unintended headers to MIME messages.

criterions.comment: apache-mime4j: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
